name: Apothecary

skills.name: Scatterbolt

effects.notes: 3 random hits at 1.4x ATK multiplier each. Total potential damage: 4.2x ATK if all hit same target. Excellent for Giant Slayer procs.

skills.book_value: Medium priority - total +25% damage (5% + 5% + 5% + 10%), but A3 cooldown is more important
skills.notes: Triple-hit A1 is excellent for Giant Slayer mastery procs (3 chances per turn). Random targeting can spread damage or focus-fire depending on RNG. Strong for breaking shields and triggering masteries.

skills.name: Soothing Chant (Cooldown: 3 turns)
skills.description: Heals a target ally by 35% HP. This Heal can be critical.

effects.notes: Base heal: 35% of target's MAX HP. Can crit for 50% boost (52.5% total). Fully booked: 50% base heal (75% crit). Build C.RATE for consistent crit heals.

skills.book_value: HIGHEST priority - reduces cooldown 3→2 turns AND increases heal 35%→50% (+15% heal). Massive survivability boost.
skills.notes: One of the best heals in the game for a Rare. Crit-able means it scales with C.RATE/C.DMG. At 100% C.RATE and 50% C.DMG, heals for 75% MAX HP every 2 turns. Can target self. Essential for dungeons and Faction Wars.

skills.name: Boon of Speed (Cooldown: 5 turns)
skills.description: Places a 30% [Increase Speed] buff on all allies for 2 turns. Fills the Turn Meter of all allies by 15%.

effects.notes: 30% Increase Speed buff on all allies for 2 turns. Stacks multiplicatively with base speed.
15% TM boost to all allies. Effective speed boost + cycle advantage. Core skill for speed tuning and turn cycling.

skills.book_value: HIGHEST priority - reduces cooldown 5→3 turns. Doubles uptime of speed buff and TM boost. Essential for all content.
skills.notes: Signature skill. Speed buff + TM boost = massive team acceleration. At 106 base SPD, Apothecary cycles A3 frequently. Fully book for 3-turn CD (up every ~4-5 turns with speed tuning). Essential for Arena, dungeons, and speed farming. Synergizes with high-damage nukers.

forms.aura: Increases Ally DEF in Dungeons by 21%

ai_quirks.ai_issue_description: AI is excellent - prioritizes A3 for speed boost, uses A2 on low-health allies. No issues on auto.

cheese_strategy.cheese_mechanic_info: Apothecary is a cornerstone of speed farming and TM boost strategies. Enables 2:1 or 3:1 speed tuning in Clan Boss. Synergizes with high-damage nukers for Arena blitz teams. Can enable cheese comps by cycling team turns faster than boss (e.g., Dragon, Fire Knight).

mechanics_advisory: One of the best Rare champions in the game. Speed buff + TM boost on A3 enables speed tuning, turn cycling, and blitz strategies. Crit-able heal on A2 (75% MAX HP with books + 100% C.RATE) provides massive sustain. Triple-hit A1 synergizes with Giant Slayer for extra damage. Excellent for all content, especially dungeons (9/10) and Faction Wars (9/10). Core support for early-to-mid game and remains viable in endgame for High Elf FW and dungeon speed teams. User Priority: Dungeons (top priority), Faction Wars (High Elf near completion). Apothecary is must-build for dungeon progression.
